summary:
The Vedas are ancient Hindu religious texts written in Sanskrit. They are considered the oldest Hindu scriptures and are divided into four main books: Rigveda, Yajurveda, Samaveda, and Atharvaveda. Each book has different sections, including mantras, explanations of rituals, and philosophical discussions.

These texts are believed to be divine knowledge, heard by ancient sages during meditation. They have been passed down orally for thousands of years. The Vedas are still important to Hinduism, and their recitations are thought to have a powerful effect on the universe.
title: Vedas
